H3.text: what time in hilo hawaii. Hawaii–Aleutian Time Zone

A4.text: Major metropolitan areas in the Hawaii–Aleutian Time Zone include Hilo, Hawaii.

A5.text: The zone takes its name from the two areas it includes: Hawaii and the portion of Alaska's Aleutian Islands west of 169° 30′ W longitude.
